text: The Piano Sonata No. 1 in F minor, Op. 2 No. 1 is a work for piano written by Ludwig van Beethoven. The sonata was written in 1795 and made public in 1796. The sonata was made for Joseph Hayden. Tovey, Beethoven, Encyclopædia Britannica Eleventh Edition == Parts == The sonata has four parts: # Allegro (F minor) # Adagio (F major) # Menuetto – Allegretto (F minor – Trio in F major) # Prestissimo (F minor) == References == Category:Compositions in F minor Piano Sonata 002
title: Piano Sonata No. 1 (Beethoven)
